item.title: Install Jupyter Lab on Ubuntu 18.04
item.description: In this tutorial we are going to see how to install Jupyter lab. More on this tool here: https://jupyterlab.readthedocs.io/en/stable/ Install NodeJS We are going to install NVM (Node Version Manager) to manage the install NodeJS version. sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y curl curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.34.0/install.sh | bash Add the following commands in your ~/.zshrc file: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" # This loads nvm [ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \.
